amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the availability of funds for procurement of the Navy and Air Force V-22 Osprey aircraft.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-88 to eliminate the availability of funds for procurement of the Navy and Air Force V-22 Osprey aircraft.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 83 - 334 (Roll no. 343).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 83 - 334 (Roll no. 343).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Woolsey.
